my servant…Israel. This servant was introduced in 41:8-9 and 42:19. Israel comprises the literal and spiritual descendants of Abraham, specifically the members of the Church (D&C 103:17; 132:30). For more on the servant's identity, see commentary on 49:1, hath called me. For other references to Israel as God's servant, see 43:10; 44:1, 2, 21; 45:4; 48:20.

I will be glorified. God's glory or brightness increases when we come to the blessings of immortality and eternal life (Moses 1:39). Those who help to promote God's work contribute to God's glory.
